_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five future perils [an5.77:7.1]: Getting bitten by a snake, a scorpion, or a centipede
Stumbling and falling, or getting food poisoning, or having bile or phlegm or stabbing wind upset
Encountering wild beasts such as a lion, a tiger, a leopard, a bear, or a hyena
Encountering youths escaping a crime or on their way to commit one
Being attacked by savage monsters in the wilderness
